page.title: 03HOME LIFE OF SIMON WILLIAMS
page.content: I wake up at 7.45a.m. I have breakfast at 8.00a.m. I have corn- flakes everyday. I dress about ten past eight for school. I put my home- work in my bag. I leave the house at 8.30 and arrive at school at 8.34. I have a lift to school by car. We go up to prayers at 9.00a.m. We sing songs and are told many bible stories by our Headmaster Mr. Stone. We then have Mental Arithmatic and we do Alpha and Beta Mathematics. At half past ten we go out to play. At l0.45 we go back in doors to do English. We then have dinner at l2 o'clock and play in the yard. Later on we have environmental studies, craft or science. We then have play. We watch television, read or listen to poetry for the last half hour. We then go home.
